data.title: Home Away From Home!
data.text: I frequent Barilari's almost every Friday with fellow teachers. The staff is friendly, informative and accommodating.  The chef is great!  Some of my favorites are their rigatoni bolognese, chicken scarpariello, eggplant florentine, and pizza. Portions are large and generally come with a salad or pasta, also generous in size. Their food is fresh, served by an excellent staff and always delicious.

data.title: A True Neighborhood Spot
data.text: I have been going to Barilari's since it has opened and there hasn't been one time that I have been disappointed by the service or the quality and quantity of the portions. The pizza has to be the best in the town.  They have the most incredible sicilian and pan pizzas and their Nona pizza and Margarita is to die for. The sauce is always fresh and harkens back to the little Italian grandmother back in the old days. They have extremely generous portions and their daily specials change, so ask for any one of them and you will not be disappointed. They also have the Chubb sandwiches which are to be enjoyed as well and incredible desserts to end your meal. All in all a very enjoyable and affordable experience every time

data.title: Great italian food on the Avenue!
data.text: Great italian food, specials were on the blackboard and were very good, sauteed chicken with veggies were great, as was chicken parm. Pizza was good as well, tasty and good quality ingredients.

data.title: Stars are for food only!!
data.text: Great food but the most unreliable service ever!  They have gotten something wrong in my order 9 times out of 10 and that is just unacceptable...but I guess that's what happens when you let 18 year olds run the place.   I cannot be the only one this happens too!  Make sure to check your food when ordering take out or delivery.  It will save you the aggravation later.  In its defense, when you get what you ordered...its soooo good!

data.title: Good food quick and easy
data.text: Enjoyed the food good prices great place to stop for a bite to eat. Comfortable atmosphere good place to have a date night casual and easy.

data.title: Great PIzza and Dinners
data.text: Been coming here since it opened.Clean and food is very good. Pizza is great. They deliver which is very good. Staff very friendly and meals are very good.

data.title: Delicious...everything
data.text: They deliver, too, really nice people working there. One time, though, I was ignored waiting for a seat. It was pretty aggravating, so I left. But, if you get pick up or delivery, it should be fine.  DELICIOUS pizza. AMAZING mozz sticks and salads. Definitely give them a try. They are one of my favorite places for a meal! Definitely!

data.title: Awesome every time
data.text: Since they have opened we usually order take out or delivery which had always been great, but last week we are in this little gem and were amazed at the quality of the food, we ordered the soup to start , great homemade mushroom , followed by  rigatoni Bolognese , OMG soooo good and penne vodka , so creamy, the pizza was also top notch and of you try the extra thin you can't go wrong. We love it here.

data.title: Garlic with Linguine
data.text: I ordered linguine with clam sauce and it came with 4-5 cloves of garlic-- too much for me.  In volume the garlic was twice the amount of clams!   I prefer pasta al dente so I considered it wobbly and overcooked. This is just a small neighborhood place and I didn't expect gourmet food, but for a $14 entre it was a disappointment.
